activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#5645
activity.text: > With `whitespace-pre-wrap` Sorry, I didn't check it properly. Now what I have observed is that if sentence has spaces between words it gets wrapped and if not it doesn't

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#5645
activity.text:
> Yes, I tried yesterday to inculcate whitespace pre wrap but the text overflow from container ! .I am finding solution that how I can use whitespace with wrap !?
> But I will raised PR today anyhow with solution.

Hey, just change `whitespace-pre` with `whitespace-pre-wrap`.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#5645
activity.text:
Try adding this note.
```
Hi,

Sample text

Today is Monday.
```

Without `whitespace-pre`:
```
Hi, Sample text Today is Monday.
```

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#5645
activity.text:
> Would multi-line doctor notes work this way since you've removed `whitespace-pre`? Was that necessary?

`whitespace-pre` doesn't wrap content, `whitespace-pre-wrap` would do all the work as expected.
